short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically refreshes the page after a specified interval.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Introducing the Auto-Refresh Chrome Extension: a versatile, user-friendly tool designed to streamline your browsing experience by automatically refreshing web pages at custom intervals. This extension goes above and beyond by incorporating advanced features like pausing auto-refresh during inactivity to save resources, monitoring web pages for changes, and notifying you with both sound and visual indicators when updates occur. With its sleek design and intuitive interface, Auto-Refresh Plus is the ideal extension for users who need an efficient and powerful solution for staying up-to-date with the latest content on their favorite websites
